parameters.name: date_min
parameters.description: [=''] Start date of period if 'custom' is set in period parameter Date format is 'YYYY-MM-DD'

parameters.name: date_max
parameters.description: [=''] End date of period if 'custom' is set in period parameter Date format is 'YYYY-MM-DD'

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: [=''] by default uses '1' for 'Configurable (CSV)' for format number or '1000' for FEC or '1010' for FEC2 (see AccountancyExport class)

parameters.name: lettering
parameters.description: [=0] by default don't export or 1 to export lettering data (columns 'letterring_code' and 'date_lettering' returns empty or not)

parameters.name: alreadyexport
parameters.description: [=0] by default export data only if it's not yet exported or 1 already exported (always export data even if 'date_export" is set)

parameters.name: notnotifiedasexport
parameters.description: [=0] by default notified as exported or 1 not notified as exported (when the export is done, notified or not the column 'date_export')

get.summary: Download a document. üîê
get.description: Note that, this API is similar to using the wrapper link "documents.php" to download a file (used for internal HTML links of documents into application), but with no need to have a session cookie (the token is used instead).

400.description: Bad value for parameter modulepart or original_file

put.description: Test sample 1: { "modulepart": "invoice", "original_file": "FA1701-001/FA1701-001.pdf", "doctemplate": "crabe", "langcode": "fr_FR" }. Supported modules: invoice, order, proposal, contract, shipment

Test sample for supplier invoice: { "filename": "mynewfile.txt", "modulepart": "supplier_invoice", "ref": "FA1701-001", "subdir": "", "filecontent": "content text", "fileencoding": "", "overwriteifexists": "0" }. Test sample for medias file: { "filename": "mynewfile.txt", "modulepart": "medias", "ref": "", "subdir": "image/mywebsite", "filecontent": "Y29udGVudCB0ZXh0Cg==", "fileencoding": "base64", "overwriteifexists": "0" }. get.summary: Login üîì
get.description: Request the API token for a couple username / password. WARNING: You should NEVER use this API, like you should never use the similar API that uses the POST method. This will expose your password. To use the APIs, you should instead set an API token to the user you want to allow to use API (This API token called DOLAPIKEY can be found/set on the user page) and use this token as credential for any API call. From the API explorer, you can enter directly the "DOLAPIKEY" into the field at the top right of the page to get access to any allowed APIs.

post.description: Request the API token for a couple username / password. WARNING: You should NEVER use this API, like you should never use the similar API that uses the POST method. This will expose your password. To use the APIs, you should instead set an API token to the user you want to allow to use API (This API token called DOLAPIKEY can be found/set on the user page) and use this token as credential for any API call. From the API explorer, you can enter directly the "DOLAPIKEY" into the field at the top right of the page to get access to any allowed APIs.

get.summary: List Mos üîê
get.description: Get a list of MOs

post.description: - If arraytoconsume and arraytoproduce are both filled, this fill an empty MO with the lines to consume and produce and record the consumption and production. - If arraytoconsume and arraytoproduce are not provided, it consumes and produces all existing lines. Example: { "inventorylabel": "Produce and consume using API", "inventorycode": "PRODUCEAPI-YY-MM-DD", "autoclose": 1, "arraytoconsume": [ "objectid": 123, -- ID_of_product "qty": "2", "fk_warehouse": "789" ], "arraytoproduce": [ "objectid": 456, -- ID_of_product "qty": "1", "fk_warehouse": "789" ] }

Example: { "inventorylabel": "Produce and consume using API", "inventorycode": "PRODUCEAPI-YY-MM-DD", "autoclose": 1, "arraytoconsume": [ { "objectid": "123", -- rowid of MoLine "qty": "2", "fk_warehouse": "789" -- "0" or empty, if stock change is disabled. } ], "arraytoproduce": [ { "objectid": "456", -- rowid of MoLine "qty": "1", "fk_warehouse": "789", "pricetoproduce": "12.3" -- optional } ] }

put.summary: Merge a third party into another one. üîê
put.description: Merge content (properties, notes) and objects (like invoices, events, orders, proposals, ...) of a thirdparty into a target third party, then delete the merged third party. If a property has a defined value both in third party to delete and third party to keep, the value into the third party to delete will be ignored, the value of target thirdparty will remain, except for notes (content is concatenated).

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

post.summary: Create and attach a new account to an existing thirdparty üîê
post.description:
Possible fields for request_data (request body) are specified in llx_societe_account table.
See Table llx_societe_account wiki page for more information

Example body payload : 
{"key_account": "cus_DAVkLSs1LYyYI", "site": "stripe"}

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

409.description: Conflict: An Account already exists for this company and site.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error creating SocieteAccount account

delete.summary: Delete all accounts attached to a thirdparty üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to delete thirdparties accounts

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error deleting SocieteAccount entity

put.summary: Create and attach a new (or replace an existing) specific site account to a thirdparty üîê
put.description:
You MUST pass all values to keep (otherwise, they will be deleted) !
If you just need to update specific fields prefer PATCH /thirdparties/{id}/accounts/{site} endpoint.

When a SocieteAccount entity does not exist for the id and site supplied, a new one will be created. In that case fk_soc and site members form request body payload will be ignored and id and site query strings parameters will be used instead.

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error updating SocieteAccount entity

patch.summary: Update specified values of a specific account attached to a thirdparty üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

409.description: Conflict: Another SocieteAccount entity already exists for this thirdparty with this site key.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error updating SocieteAccount entity

delete.summary: Delete a specific site account attached to a thirdparty (by account id) üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to delete thirdparties accounts

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error deleting SocieteAccount entity

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: User ids filter field. Example: '1' or '1,2,3'

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Use this param to filter list by category

parameters.name: sqlfilters
parameters.description: Other criteria to filter answers separated by a comma. Syntax example "(t.ref:like:'SO-%') and (t.date_creation:<:'20160101')"

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Restrict the data returned to these properties. Ignored if empty. Comma separated list of properties names

parameters.description: Set this to 1 to have the array of permissions loaded (not done by default for performance purpose)

parameters.description: Set this to 1 to have the array of permissions loaded (not done by default for performance purpose)

parameters.description: Other criteria to filter answers separated by a comma. Syntax example "(t.ref:like:'SO-%') and (t.date_creation:<:'20160101')"

parameters.name: properties

fix.description: key value pairs for fixing value types using functions. For example 'id'=>'intval' will make sure all values of the id properties will be converted to integers intval function 'password'=> null will remove all the password entries

separatorChar.description: character that is used to identify sub objects For example when Object::$separatorChar = '.'; array('my.object'=>true) will result in array( 'my'=>array('object'=>true) );

removeEmpty.description: set it to true when empty arrays, blank strings, null values to be automatically removed from response

removeNull.description: set it to true to remove all null values from the result

bankaccount_from_id.description: BankAccount ID to use as the source of the internal wire transfer

bankaccount_to_id.description: BankAccount ID to use as the destination of the internal wire transfer

date.description: Date of the internal wire transfer (UNIX timestamp)

description.description: Description of the internal wire transfer

amount.description: Amount to transfer from the source to the destination BankAccount

amount_to.description: Amount to transfer to the destination BankAccount (only when accounts does not share the same currency)

url_id.description: ID to set in the URL

modulepart.description: Name of module or area concerned by file download ('thirdparty', 'member', 'proposal', 'supplier_proposal', 'order', 'supplier_order', 'invoice', 'supplier_invoice', 'shipment', 'project', ...)

original_file.description: Relative path with filename, relative to modulepart (for example: IN201701-999/IN201701-999.pdf).

doctemplate.description: Set here the doc template to use for document generation (If not set, use the default template).

langcode.description: Language code like 'en_US', 'fr_FR', 'es_ES', ... (If not set, use the default language).

modulepart.description: Name of module or area concerned by file upload ('product', 'service', 'invoice', 'proposal', 'project', 'project_task', 'supplier_invoice', 'expensereport', 'member', ...)

ref.description: Reference of object (This will define subdir automatically and store submitted file into it)

filecontent.description: File content (string with file content. An empty file will be created if this parameter is not provided)

overwriteifexists.description: Overwrite file if exists (1 by default)

createdirifnotexists.description: Create subdirectories if the doesn't exists (1 by default)

fk_socpeople.description: Id of thirdparty contact (if source = 'external') or id of user (if source = 'internal') to link

type_contact.description: Type of contact (code). Must a code found into table llx_c_type_contact. For example: BILLING

close_code.description: Code filled if we classify to 'Paid completely' when payment is not complete (for escompte for example)

close_note.description: Comment defined if we classify to 'Paid' when payment is not complete (for escompte for example)

arrayofamounts.description: Array with id of invoices with amount to pay for each invoice

accepthigherpayment.description: Accept higher payments that it remains to be paid (optional)

entity.description: Entity (when multicompany module is used). '' means 1=first company.

reset.description: Reset token (0=get current token, 1=ask a new token and canceled old token. This means access using current existing API token of user will fails: new token will be required for new access)

idwarehouse.description: Warehouse ID to use for stock change (Used only if option STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_VALIDATE_ORDER is on)

incdec.description: 1=Increase/decrease stock of child when parent stock increase/decrease

qty.description: Min quantity for which price is valid

buyprice.description: Purchase price for the quantity min

tva_tx.description: New VAT Rate (For example 8.5. Should not be a string)

delivery_time_days.description: Delay in days for delivery (max). May be '' if not defined.

supplier_reputation.description: Reputation with this product to the defined supplier (empty, FAVORITE, DONOTORDER)

localtaxes_array.description: Array with localtaxes info array('0'=>type1,'1'=>rate1,'2'=>type2,'3'=>rate2) (loaded by getLocalTaxesFromRate(vatrate, 0, ...) function).

multicurrency_buyprice.description: Purchase price for the quantity min in currency

price_impact_is_percent.description: Price impact in percent (true or false)

features.description: List of attributes pairs id_attribute->id_value. Example: array(id_color=>id_Blue, id_size=>id_small, id_option=>id_val_a, ...)

price_impact_is_percent.description: Price impact in percent (true or false)

features.description: List of attributes pairs id_attribute->id_value. Example: array(id_color=>id_Blue, id_size=>id_small, id_option=>id_val_a, ...)

note_private.description: Add this mention at end of private note

payment_mode_id.description: Payment mode ID (look it up via REST GET to /setup/dictionary/payment_types)

accountid.description: Bank account ID (look it up via REST GET to /bankaccounts)

chqemetteur.description: Payment issuer (mandatory if payment_mode_id corresponds to 'CHQ'-payment type)

amount.description: Amount of payment if we don't want to use the remain to pay

closeopenorder.description: Close order if everything is received
